utterances: Tamara, are these mostly symbolic sanctions?

I think that I've come to a split that really takes into consideration the vast majority of things that will occur in the life of an animal-owning home, which is - and I apologize for the word own, I mean an animal-caring home - which is 50 percent raw, 45 percent can, five percent dry.
I know that may be shocking, but there are good-quality canned foods out these despite this most recent hoorah.
